name: @openfeature/multi-provider
deprecated: This package is deprecated. The Multi-Provider is now included in @openfeature/server-sdk. Please migrate to use the SDK directly.

scripts.publish-if-not-exists: cp $NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG .npmrc && if [ "$(npm show $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version version)" = "$(npm run current-version -s)" ]; then echo 'already published, skipping'; else npm publish --access public; fi
